Articles.Content: Billy Winn Jr is probably the YouTuber with the most infectious laugh in the world, and the crazy KSP adventures he often partakes in make sure that thereÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s never a dull moment in his videos. Check out his [ ">**YouTube channel**](

"AH HA HA HA AHH HA HA HA, OH HO HO HO HAH HA HA HA"

You weren't kidding about that laugh. LOL

Well, at least he has a sense of humor! hehe

His laughing is probably the funniest thing in the vid!

Heh. Been checking out Jatwaa ever since he put all of his videos in the Fan Works individually and didn't stop for *months* ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)(Where my old-school Fan works crowd at?)

Jatwaa's a great YouTuber, and his laugh is almost as infectious as

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/fyEThSM4JnI?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
 in my opinion. I'll also say that this is the first time I

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/iBkGl6RyBjI?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
 to a cool channel before SQUAD did. That's pretty neat.
Congrants Jatwaa! And thanks, Badie, for featuring a channel rather than any one specific video. That's one thing I would love to see more of in the future ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

-Upsilon

Thanks!!!!!!

Would you like to feature more channels instead of single videos in the future? Jatwaa's channel is great!

Oh wow! Thanks Lita for letting me know I don't know how I missed this LOL! Thanks Squad! If it wasn't for you all I probably would have been staring at my screen wondering what I was going to do with my days. It is awesome to jump on here and see that the channel is being enjoyed. I am thrilled to try to bring a smile to everyone out there as much as I can. You all are the real blessing that keeps my lil channel going!
am i the only one that didnt laught? ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
Now that laugh IS going to be my new mobile phone ring tone!
Its hard not to smile when you see someone enjoying themselves playing a game so much. Even harder when that game is something you enjoy as well.

> 
> Thanks!!!!!!
> Would you like to feature more channels instead of single videos in the future? Jatwaa's channel is great!

I'd agree, featuring channels seems better.

> 
> Thanks!!!!!!

No problem ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Would you like to feature more channels instead of single videos in the future? Jatwaa's channel is great!

There are three things you can do here, Badie. If I were you, I'd do a combination of all of them!

**Thing #1: Individual Videos.** SQUAD's traditionally done a lot of this. It's just posting a link to a single video for KSP players' enjoyment.

**Thing #2: Video Series-es.** I've only seen this done a few times ([here's one](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/90551-Video-Wednesdays-Rover-Adventures-Around-Kerbin-24), for example), but I always like when it happens. This is showcasing a particular Kerbal Space Program series that's really cool.

**Thing #3: YouTube Channels.** That's what you did for Jatwaa and, as you may well know, it hasn't been done too often either. I really like the idea, though! And yes, it would be nice to see more of this in the future.

Keep up the good work!

-Upsilon
